password_error.uppercase_error: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.

password_error.number_error: Password must contain at least one number.
password_error.special_char_error: Password must contain at least one special character.
password_error.repeated_chars_error: Password must not contain three or more consecutive identical characters.
